page.title: 09INTERVIEW WITH P C LAYCOCK
page.content: I have worked with the Police Force for 9 years. My area includes all of Ifold, Plaistow, Loxwood, Alfold and the Surrey border, Wisborough Green and, in the other direction, Drungewick Lane to Shillinglea. {The main change in police work has {been the traffic.}There were not very many cars when I started but now there are lots more. I do about 25 jobs a week and I attend about 100 accidents a year and about 10 burglaries. My truncheon is made from ebony and the strap from leather. I share a police car with my partner, Mr Tester, who has an area of Wisborough Green, Kirdford and Balls Cross. I often go into the{local school}to see what the children are doing. I also{coach the boys for cricket}at the recreation ground.
